titleStmt.title: At Lily's Head, over against Ludgate Church, within Black Fryars Gateway, next door to the feather-shop you will find your old physian [sic], J.C. of 22 years practice, ...
titleStmt.author: Case, John, Dr.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Imperfect: stained and torn at head, affecting text slightly.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
